name: SEX with HITLER 3D
description:
SEX with HITLER 3D is a visual novel for adults.
Sexy girl Kate interrogates a captured Adolf Hitler, trying to find out all his secrets.
The game contains scenes for adults that gradually open up as you progress through the game.
In this game you will have a great opportunity to experiment and realize your secret desires together with Adolf and his interlocutor Kate.

Features:

  • Real-time 3D character and animations
  • VN Style story with dynamic camera angles, and outfits you select.
  • Clothing customization including casual to sexy outfits and costumes
  • Sex Sim gameplay with various speed and cumming options, groping, petting.
  • Ability to play with one hand. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)

ALL CHARACTERS ARE OVER 18 YEARS OLD
